todo_list.task: Implement a standardized 'H2Q_Base_Module' to unify all DiscreteDecisionEngine instantiations, resolving the recurrent '__init__ got an unexpected keyword argument dim' error by enforcing a Pydantic-validated LatentConfig injection across the Global Interface Registry.

Develop the 'M4-AMX-Fused-Hamilton-GEMM' Metal kernel utilizing SIMD-group matrix primitives (16x16 tiling) to achieve the 10x throughput target for quaternionic manifold updates, bypassing standard MPS dispatch overhead.

Construct the 'Genomic-Logic-Braid-Integrator' to calculate discrete Gauss Linking Numbers between StarCoder byte-trajectories and HG38 non-coding DNA FASTA streams, establishing the first verifiable semantic isomorphism between algorithmic and biological knots.

Engineer the 'Thermal-Geodesic-Homeostat', a governance service that hooks into M4 thermal and SLC cache telemetry to dynamically modulate the TTD (Topological Time Dilation) recursion depth k and SSD-paging frequency during high-pressure Wake phases.

Build the 'Poincare-Bargmann-Visualizer', a real-time diagnostic dashboard that maps 3-point Bargmann invariants onto a hyperbolic disk to visualize Berry Phase accumulation and manifold stabilization during the HJB Healing (Sleep) phase.
Implement 16x16 AMX-tiled Quaternionic multiplication using direct Metal SIMDgroup_matrix intrinsics to saturate M4 throughput targets (10x gain over torch.bmm).
Develop the L2-Schema-Weaver service to consolidate redundant RSKH knots into persistent L2 'World-Knowledge' crystals via Karcher Flow Fréchet means.
Create the Holomorphic-Healer-Middleware: an autoregressive decoder wrapper that uses 1st-order Quaternionic Taylor expansions to neutralize Fueter residuals exceeding 0.05 threshold.
Implement a Geodesic-Predictive SSD Prefetcher that calculates the su(2) tangent vector of current manifold states to asynchronously load upcoming RSKH context knots into Unified Memory.
Develop a Bit-Accurate Reversibility Sentinel suite to verify that 10^7 recursive Hamilton operations maintain manifold L1-drift below 1e-7 on M4 silicon.

Implement 'Geodesic Snap-Back' in h2q/core/generation/holomorphic_backtracker.py: use the Reversible Kernel's inverse property to physically unroll hallucinatory reasoning branches where Df > 0.05 and re-initiate search from the last analytic knot.

Develop h2q/core/accelerators/m4_auto_tiler.py to dynamically re-index Metal JIT kernels between 8x8, 16x16, and 32x32 tiling configurations based on real-time M4 NPU register pressure telemetry and manifold entropy.

Build h2q/governance/rank_resuscitator.py to monitor the Heat-Death Index (HDI) and trigger Fractal Noise Injection (h ± δ) when the effective rank of the 256-D manifold falls below the 128-dimensional critical boundary.

Construct h2q/core/distillation/genomic_logic_bridge.py to compute 3-point Bargmann invariants between human non-coding DNA FASTA streams and StarCoder algorithmic knots, identifying semantic isomorphisms in the SU(2) manifold.

Integrate 4th-order Fueter-Laplace biharmonic regularization into h2q/core/optimization/holomorphic_backprop.py to penalize high-frequency logic curvature and stabilize long-context autoregressive flow.

[M4_AMX_INTRINSIC_BINDING] Implement a C++/Objective-C++ PyTorch extension to bridge the MetalJITBridge with native simdgroup_matrix AMX intrinsics, replacing the current MSL simulation with hardware-level 16x16 tiled Hamilton GEMM.

[HOLOMORPHIC_CONTROL_PLANE] Develop a unified inference orchestrator for the h2q_server that integrates the HolomorphicBacktracker, UHBSHealer, and ThermalGeodesicGovernor to perform real-time branch pruning and manifold healing based on M4 thermal telemetry.

[ZWI_PHASE_TUNER] Implement a Zero-Weight Intelligence (ZWI) trainer that freezes the 256-D manifold weights and adapts the system to new logical domains solely by optimizing the spectral phase-shift (η) using Fractal Differential Calculus (FDC).

[GENOMIC_ISOMORPHISM_DISCOVERY] Create an automated discovery agent that streams real human chromosome data (HG38) through the GaussLinkingIntegrator and cross-references results against StarCoder logic knots to populate the L2_Schema_Vault with biological-computational invariants.

[RSKH_V2_MMAP_ORCHESTRATOR] Refactor the RSKH vault into a multi-tiered paging system that uses the Heat-Death Index (HDI) to prioritize which knots stay in Unified Memory, which are downsampled to 4-bit TPQ, and which are mapped to SSD.
h2q/core/accelerators/m4_jit_compiler.py: Implement a complete JIT pipeline that invokes 'xcrun' to compile MSL source strings into binary .metallib modules at runtime for hot-swapping AMX kernels.

h2q/services/synesthesia_central.py: Construct a unified multimodal orchestrator that computes the Karcher Flow (Fréchet mean) across Audio, Vision, Text, and Genomic manifolds to establish a singular semantic barycenter.

h2q/core/memory/hdi_sparsity_scheduler.py: Develop a real-time scheduler that dynamically deallocates or pages manifold knots to SSD based on localized Heat-Death Index (HDI) telemetry to preserve the 16GB RAM limit.

h2q/logic/biharmonic_loss_integration.py: Integrate the 4th-order Fueter-Laplace operator as a native PyTorch loss function in the 'train_knot.py' L0 pipeline to penalize high-frequency logic curvature.

h2q/experiments/active_inference_feedback.py: Implement the closed-loop feedback mechanism where environmental drag μ(E) directly modulates the Discrete Decision Engine's (DDE) exploration alpha in real-time.
Implement the [GTER-ADJOINT] Metal kernel: a bit-accurate gradient reconstruction utility for 16x16 tiled Hamilton products to finalize the O(1) backpropagation loop on M4 AMX hardware.

Refactor the [GLOBAL-INTERFACE-REGISTRY] to enforce strict Pydantic-based signature validation for all DDE (Discrete Decision Engine) instantiations, preventing 'dim' vs 'latent_dim' attribute hallucinations.

Develop the [UHBS-HEALER] service: an integration of Holomorphic Beam Search with real-time HJB Geodesic Repair that snaps the manifold back to analytic paths when Df residuals breach the 0.05 threshold during long-context streaming.

Engineer the [DYNAMIC-DRAG-V-SYNC] scheduler: A homeostatic controller that modulates the Fractal Expansion delta (δ) and sampling temperature based on the instantaneous ratio of Spectral Shift (η) to Heat-Death Index (HDI).

Create the [BARGMANN-EXPLORER]: A visual diagnostic tool that maps the 3-point Bargmann invariants of StarCoder logic knots and Genomic FASTA sequences onto a shared hyperbolic Poincare Disk to verify cross-modal semantic isomorphism.

Implement a 'Genomic-StarCoder Isomorphism Trainer' using the Bargmann 3-point invariant to align non-coding FASTA sequences with StarCoder logic kernels on the SU(2) manifold, proving semantic resonance between biological and algorithmic knots.

Develop the 'M4 Homeostatic Governor', a unified controller that monitors thermal pressure and SLC cache telemetry to dynamically adjust TTD (Topological Time Dilation) recursion depth and AMX tile sizes, preventing hardware throttling during long-context streaming.

Create a 'Holomorphic Reasoning Backtracker' for the h2q_server that performs automated geodesic snap-backs. If the Fueter residual exceeds the 0.05 threshold during generation, the system must rewind the reasoning path to the nearest stable RSKH vault knot.

Build the 'L2 Schema Weaver' utility to periodically audit the RSKH vault, identifying clusters of topologically equivalent L1 knots and consolidating them into persistent L2 Super-Knots using Karcher Flow Fréchet means.

Implement a 'Spectral Entropy Auto-Tuner' for the FDCOptimizer to modulate the Fractal Expansion delta scale in real-time, ensuring the manifold effective rank stays above the 128-dimensional critical boundary to prevent Manifold Heat-Death.

Develop 'Holomorphic Pruning Search' (HPS): An autoregressive decoder for the production server that utilizes the 4th-order Fueter-Laplace biharmonic residual as a hard-pruning constraint in beam search, discarding reasoning branches where logic curvature exceeds 0.05.

Implement 'Thermal Geodesic Governor' (TGG): A hardware-integrated controller that dynamically scales Fractal Expansion depth (4 to 12) and AMX tiling sizes (8x8 to 32x32) based on M4 thermal pressure and SLC cache telemetry to prevent throttling during 1M+ token reasoning sessions.

Implement 'Zero-Weight Spectral Fine-Tuner': A ZWI-based training module that optimizes manifold phase-shifts (η) for downstream classification tasks without updating frozen neural weights, benchmarking performance against standard SGD on StarCoder-logic-knots.

Construct 'Genomic Key-Vault Interface': A security and retrieval layer where specific topological invariants extracted from non-coding FASTA sequences serve as 'Geometric Keys' to decrypt or unlock high-entropy L2 Cognitive Schemas stored in the RSKH vault.

Create 'Bit-Accurate Reversibility Sentinel': A rigorous diagnostic suite that monitors L1-gradient drift across 10^7 recursive Hamilton operations to ensure that Reversible Kernel reconstruction maintains bit-level veracity on M4 Unified Memory.

Implement a 'Topological Self-Organization' (TSO) Optimizer that dynamically prunes or expands the manifold density based on real-time η-volatility and environmental drag μ(E), ensuring 16GB RAM stability for 100M+ token streams.
Develop the 'Holomorphic Guard' FastAPI Middleware for h2q_server, integrating 2nd-order Fueter-Laplace curvature checks to prune non-analytic reasoning branches during autoregressive generation.
Finalize the 4-bit TPQ (Topological Phase Quantization) Bit-Packing Kernel, enabling physical 8:1 memory reduction for 'frozen' knots in the RSKH vault using M4-optimized bit-shifting.

Construct a high-throughput 'Bargmann Isomorphism Prover' to scan FASTA genomic datasets and StarCoder logic kernels, identifying shared semantic invariants through 3-point geometric phase interference.
Implement an asynchronous 'HJB Geodesic Recovery' background service that automatically iterates through SSD-paged knots to neutralize Berry Phase drift and restore manifold holomorphicity.

Implement the 'Unified_Holomorphic_Transformer_Block' in h2q/core/layers/uht.py, fusing CPIG (Constructive Phase Interference Gating), Reversible Hamilton Kernels, and TTD (Topological Time Dilation) into a singular O(1) memory unit.

Develop a production-grade C++/Objective-C++ bridge in h2q/core/accelerators/m4_native_ops.mm to bind the 16x16 tiled MSL kernels directly to PyTorch's MPS backend, targeting 10x throughput for Quaternionic GEMM.

Construct the 'L2_Cognitive_Schema_Vault' orchestrator in h2q/core/memory/l2_vault.py, integrating RSKH-V2 signatures with Bargmann 3-point invariant retrieval for semantic persistence across 100M+ token windows.

Create a 'Geodesic_Path_Integral_Optimizer' in h2q/core/optimizers/gpio.py that calculates the action integral S = ∫ L dt along the reasoning trace to prevent manifold collapse during long-context fine-tuning.
Develop a 'Holomorphic_Telemetry_Middleware' for the h2q_server to provide real-time WebSocket streams of the Poincare Curvature Map and Heat-Death Index (HDI) during inference.

Develop a unified Bargmann Training Loop that uses the 3-point Bargmann Invariant (Tr[P1P2P3]) as a direct loss function to enforce semantic isomorphism between genomic FASTA sequences and StarCoder logic kernels.

Implement a Predictive Geodesic Prefetcher for the RSKH SSD Paging system that utilizes the tangent vector of the SU(2) manifold state to anticipate and asynchronously load upcoming context knots from NVMe into M4 Unified Memory.

Engineer a Register-Pressure-Aware Auto-Tiler for the Metal JIT Bridge that dynamically switches between 8x8, 16x16, and 32x32 MSL kernels based on real-time NPU/GPU occupancy telemetry to prevent register spills on the Mac Mini M4.

Integrate the Berry Curvature Loss into the ModalitySynchronizer to penalize non-parallel transport during cross-modal alignment, ensuring that the geometric phase shift is uniform across Audio, Vision, and Text manifolds.

Create a Holomorphic Reasoning Backtracker that uses the 4th-order Fueter-Laplace residual to trigger automated geodesic snap-backs to the nearest stable RSKH knot when a logic divergence is detected during streaming inference.
